title: Biden administration waives 26 federal laws to allow border wall construction
description: The Department of Homeland Security announced that the Biden administration leveraged sweeping executive power to waive 26 federal laws in South Texas

title: Infant dies after pregnant bystander struck in shooting at intersection: Officials
description: A shooting at a Massachusetts intersection on Wednesday critically injured a pregnant bystander passing by on a bus, whose infant subsequently died, officials said.

title: Pennsylvania mummy known as 'Stoneman Willie' identified after 128 years of mystery
description: After more than a century of being kept at a Reading, Pennsylvania, funeral home, a corpse that was mummified has been identified, according to the funeral home.

title: WATCH:  Little girl has best reaction to seeing her dad after day care
description: Da’rius Morman filmed the moment he went to pick up his 3-year-old daughter from day care and she greeted him with an adorable cheer and dance.

title: Say goodbye to the COVID-19 vaccination card. The CDC has stopped printing them
description: The once-critical white COVID-19 vaccination cards are being phased out

title: Texas official faces criminal charges for accidentally shooting grandson at wedding
description: A Texas politician who accidentally shot his grandson during a wedding he was officiating in Nebraska could be charged with a felony

title: Brett Favre will testify under oath in Mississippi welfare scandal civil case
description: Retired NFL quarterback Brett Favre will answer questions under oath about the misspending of federal welfare money in Mississippi

title: Jersey Shore town sues to overturn toxic waste settlement where cancer cases rose
description: A Jersey Shore town where childhood cancer cases rose is suing to overturn a settlement between the state and the corporate successor to the company that dumped toxic waste into the water and ground for decades

title: University of Maryland bus hits light pole, sending 27 to hospitals
description: Authorities say a University of Maryland bus has crashed injuring 27 people

title: ‘Tiger King’ trainer 'Doc' Antle gets suspended sentence for wildlife trafficking
description: Virginia's attorney general says an animal trainer featured in the popular Netflix series “Tiger King” has received a suspended two-year sentence after being convicted of wildlife trafficking

title: Officer indicted for allegedly punching man 13 times after refusing to wear mask
description: A New York City police officer is accused of punching a man more than a dozen times while responding to a call about an emotionally disturbed child last year.

title: Sunak plans to raise the legal smoking age in England
description: U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has proposed raising the legal age that people in England can buy cigarettes until it applies to the whole population

title: El Chapo's sons purportedly ban fentanyl in Mexico's Sinaloa state
description: The machine-printed banners were purportedly signed by a faction of the Sinaloa cartel led by the sons of jailed Mexican drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman.

title: Greek police arrest 2 in connection with gangland car ambush that left 6 Turks dead
description: Greek authorities say they have arrested two Turkish men on suspicion of involvement in the fatal gangland shooting of six other Turks in Greece last month

title: Giuliani to lose 2nd attorney in Georgia, leaving him without local legal team
description: A second lawyer for Rudy Giuliani is seeking to depart his legal team in Georgia, sources tell ABC News, which would appear to leave him without any local lawyers there.

title: Pilot accused of stalking New York woman via small airplane, flying from Vermont
description: Police say a man has been accused of stalking a woman in New York via his small airplane, flying out of an airport in nearby Vermont

title: Federal government to conduct a nationwide emergency alert test
description: The test is slated to start at 2:20 p.m. Eastern Time Wednesday.

title: Bodies of mother bear and her 2 cubs found dumped on state land leads to arrest
description: A man has been arrested after a mother bear and her two cubs were shot and killed before their bodies were dumped on state land.

title: Pope calls for binding, verifiable climate targets at next UN meeting
description: Pope calls for binding, verifiable climate targets at next UN meeting, warns warming world nearing 'point of no return'

title: WATCH:  CCTV captures terrifying moment E-bike battery burst into flames
description: CCTV captures the moment an e-bike's lithium-iron battery explodes in a hostel in Sydney, Australia, causing backpackers to flee.

title: Russia says it has foiled a major Ukrainian drone attack
description: Russia says its air defenses shot down 31 Ukrainian drones.

title: Former Russian TV journalist gets 8 1/2-year sentence in absentia for war criticism
description: Marina Ovsyannikova ran onto TV carrying an anti-war sign.

title: 1 dead after crane topples at construction site in Florida
description: A person trapped under a crane has died after the device fell on top of them during an industrial accident in Florida, authorities said.

title: Swedish media say winners of Nobel Prize in chemistry may have been announced early
description: Swedish media say the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences may have announced the winners of this year’s Nobel Prize in chemistry prematurely

title: WATCH:  Hail blankets city in New Mexico
description: A bout of hail came down in the city of Las Vegas, New Mexico, creating a winter-like scene as the ice piled up.

title: Suspect in Bangkok mall shooting that killed 2 used a modified mock gun, police say
description: Police say a teenage boy who allegedly shot two people dead and wounded five others inside a major shopping mall in Thailand's capital used a mock handgun that had been modified to fire real bullets

title: WATCH:  Alligator missing upper jaw finds home at shelter
description: An alligator missing its upper jaw -- affectionately named "Jawlene" -- has found a home at a Florida shelter.

title: 'Multiple victims' from active shooter situation near Morgan State University: Police
description: Baltimore police are responding to the scene of an active shooter situation, and have said "multiple victims" are involved.

title: Duane Davis, Tupac in group scuffle months before killing: Witness
description: Duane Davis and Tupac involved in confrontation with 'brandished' gun six months before the shooting.

title: Lawsuit: False arrest due to misuse of facial recognition technology
description: Randal Quran Reid is now filing a lawsuit for the wrongful detainment.

title: Student sentenced to 1 year in Dubai prison over airport altercation freed: Group
description: A New York City college student who was sentenced to prison time in the United Arab Emirates over an incident at a Dubai airport has been freed, an advocacy group said.

title: Mayor indicted on bribery charge alleging he took $50,000 to facilitate property sale
description: A suburban Detroit mayor has been indicted on a federal bribery charge for allegedly demanding $50,000 in bribes to facilitate the sale of a city property to an outside party
